amendment.description: Amendment provides for implementation of the harbor mainentance allocations required under WRRDA 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of section 2101 of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014 (33 U.S.C. 2238b) or section 210 of the Water Resources Development ACt of 1986.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mrs. Napolitano.
